verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> it was determined <S%G2919><s%> <S%G5681><s%> that we <S%G2248><s%> should sail <S%G636><s%> <S%G5721><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Italy <S%G2482><s%>, they delivered <S%G3860><s%> <S%G5707><s%> <S%G5037><s%> SHa'ul <S%G3972><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> prisoners <S%G1202><s%> unto one named <S%G3686><s%> Julius <S%G2457><s%>, a centurion <S%G1543><s%> of Augustus <S%G4575><s%>' band <S%G4686><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> entering <S%G1910><s%> <S%G5631><s%> into a ship <S%G4143><s%> of Adramyttium <S%G98><s%>, we launched <S%G321><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, meaning <S%G3195><s%> <S%G5723><s%> to sail <S%G4126><s%> <S%G5721><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> the coasts <S%G5117><s%> of Asia <S%G773><s%>; one Aristarchus <S%G708><s%>, a Macedonian <S%G3110><s%> of Thessalonica <S%G2331><s%>, being <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> us <S%G2254><s%>.

And <S%G5037><s%> the next <S%G2087><s%> day we touched <S%G2609><s%> <S%G5648><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> TZidon <S%G4605><s%>. And <S%G5037><s%> Julius <S%G2457><s%> courteously <S%G5364><s%> entreated <S%G5530><s%> <S%G5666><s%> SHa'ul <S%G3972><s%>, and gave him liberty <S%G2010><s%> <S%G5656><s%> to go <S%G4198><s%> <S%G5679><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> his friends <S%G5384><s%> to refresh himself <S%G5177><s%> <S%G5629><s%> <S%G1958><s%>.

And <S%G2547><s%> when we had launched <S%G321><s%> <S%G5685><s%> from thence <S%G2547><s%>, we sailed under <S%G5284><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Cyprus <S%G2954><s%>, because <S%G1223><s%> the winds <S%G417><s%> were <S%G1511><s%> <S%G5750><s%> contrary <S%G1727><s%>.

And <S%G5037><s%> when we had sailed over <S%G1277><s%> <S%G5660><s%> the sea <S%G3989><s%> of <S%G2596><s%> Cilicia <S%G2791><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Pamphylia <S%G3828><s%>, we came <S%G2718><s%> <S%G5627><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Myra <S%G3460><s%>, a city of Lycia <S%G3073><s%>.

And there <S%G2546><s%> the centurion <S%G1543><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5631><s%> a ship <S%G4143><s%> of Alexandria <S%G222><s%> sailing <S%G4126><s%> <S%G5723><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Italy <S%G2482><s%>; and he put <S%G1688><s%> <S%G5656><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> therein <S%G1519><s%> <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when we had sailed slowly <S%G1020><s%> <S%G5723><s%> <S%G1722><s%> many <S%G2425><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> scarce <S%G3433><s%> were come <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5637><s%> over against <S%G2596><s%> Cnidus <S%G2834><s%>, the wind <S%G417><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> suffering <S%G4330><s%> <S%G5723><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>, we sailed under <S%G5284><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Crete <S%G2914><s%>, over against <S%G2596><s%> Salmone <S%G4534><s%>;
